content: May 8 (OPTA) - Premier League fixtures for this week Monday, May 8 fixtures (BST/GMT) Fulham v Leicester City (1500/1400) Brighton &amp; Hove Albion v Everton (1730/1630) Nottingham Forest v Southampton (2000/1900) Saturday, May 13 fixtures (BST/GMT) Leeds United v Newcastle United (1230/1130) Aston Villa v Tottenham Hotspur (1500/1400) Chelsea v Nottingham Forest (1500/1400) Crystal Palace v AFC Bournemouth (1500/1400) Manchester United v Wolverhampton Wanderers (1500/1400) Southampton v Fulham (1500/1400) Sunday, May 14 fixtures (BST/GMT) Brentford v West Ham United (1400/1300) Everton v Manchester City (1400/1300) Arsenal v Brighton &amp; Hove Albion (1630/1530) Monday, May 15 fixtures (BST/GMT) Leicester City v Liverpool (2000/1900)
